languages.text: "Я отчитала не одного посыльного на этом корабле". {n}Кассия на секунду задумывается.{/n} "Кажется, припоминаю! Добрый юноша с кроткой улыбкой и золотыми руками, на плечах которого скопилось слишком много охряно-гнилого. Мне надоел этот мерзкий цвет, и я посоветовала юноше облегчить ношу и сбросить груз с плеч. А на следующий день он так и не пришел. И после тоже".

traits.locale_text: "Я отчитала не одного посыльного на этом корабле". {n}Кассия на секунду задумывается.{/n} "Кажется, припоминаю! Добрый малый с кроткой улыбкой и золотыми руками, на плечах которого скопилось слишком много желто-гнилого. Мне надоел этот мерзкий цвет, и я посоветовала юноше облегчить ношу и сбросить груз с плеч. А на следующий день он так и не пришел. И после тоже".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "I haven't rebuked a single errand boy on this ship." {n}Cassia ponders this for a moment.{/n} "Ah, I think I remember! A kind young man with a shy smile and skilful fingers with too much rotten ochre on his shoulders. I grew tired of the disgusting colour and advised him to lighten his burden by casting the weight off his shoulders. He did not come the next day. Or ever again."
languages.original_text: "Я отчитала не одного посыльного на этом корабле". {n}Кассия на секунду задумывается.{/n} "Кажется, припоминаю! Добрый юноша с кроткой улыбкой и золотыми руками, на плечах которого скопилось слишком много охряно-гнилого. Мне надоел этот мерзкий цвет, и я посоветовала юноше облегчить ношу и сбросить груз с плеч. А на следующий день он так и не пришел. И после тоже".

traits.locale_text: "I haven't rebuked a single errand boy on this ship." {n}Cassia thinks for a moment.{/n} "I think I remember! A kind young man with a shy smile and skillful fingers with too much rotten ochre on his shoulders. I grew tired of this disgusting color and advised him to lighten the burden and take this weight off his shoulders. He did not come the next day. Or ever after."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

A kind young man with a shy smile and skilful fingers with too much rotten ochre on his shoulders. I grew tired of the disgusting colour and advised him to lighten his burden by casting the weight off his shoulders. He did not come the next day. Or ever again."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “我根本没有在这艘船上斥责过任何一位跑腿的信使。”{n}卡西娅思考了一会儿。{/n}“啊，我好像想起来了！那是位善良的年轻人，脸上带着羞涩的笑容，手指也很灵巧。他的肩膀上压着太多腐烂的赭石色，这种令人作呕的颜色让我感到厌烦。于是，我建议他把肩上的重负都丢在一旁，减轻负担。第二天他没有出现，之后也再也没有出现过。”
languages.original_text: "I haven't rebuked a single errand boy on this ship." {n}Cassia ponders this for a moment.{/n} "Ah, I think I remember! A kind young man with a shy smile and skilful fingers with too much rotten ochre on his shoulders. I grew tired of the disgusting colour and advised him to lighten his burden by casting the weight off his shoulders. He did not come the next day. Or ever again."

traits.locale_text: “我根本没有在这艘船上斥责过任何一位跑腿的信使。”{n}卡西娅思考了一会儿。{/n}“啊，我好像想起来了！那是位善良的年轻人，脸上带着羞涩的笑容，手指也很灵巧。他的肩膀上压着太多腐烂的赭石色，这种令人作呕的颜色让我感到厌烦。于是，我建议他把肩上的重负都丢在一旁，减轻负担。第二天他没有出现，之后也再也没有出现过。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «No he regañado a ninguno de los recaderos de la nave». {n}Cassia medita durante un momento.{/n} «Ah, ¡creo que ya lo recuerdo! Un joven amable con sonrisa tímida y manos hábiles, que tenía demasiado ocre en sus hombros. Me cansé de ese asqueroso color y le recomendé que aligerara su carga y quitara un peso de encima. No volvió al día siguiente. Ni nunca».
languages.original_text: "I haven't rebuked a single errand boy on this ship." {n}Cassia ponders this for a moment.{/n} "Ah, I think I remember! A kind young man with a shy smile and skilful fingers with too much rotten ochre on his shoulders. I grew tired of the disgusting colour and advised him to lighten his burden by casting the weight off his shoulders. He did not come the next day. Or ever again."

traits.locale_text: «No he regañado a ninguno de los recaderos de la nave». {n}Cassia medita durante un momento.{/n} «Ah, ¡creo que ya lo recuerdo! Un joven amable con sonrisa tímida y manos hábiles, que tenía demasiado ocre en sus hombros. Me cansé de ese asqueroso color y le recomendé que aligerara su carga y quitara un peso de encima. No volvió al día siguiente. Ni nunca».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「あたくしはこの船の使用人を一人も叱責したことはありません」{n}カシアはしばらく考え込む。{/n}「ええ、思い出しました！内気な笑みを浮かべ、指先の器用な優しい青年が、肩に腐った黄土を抱えすぎていたのです。あたくしはその嫌な色に嫌気がさして、肩の荷を下ろすようにアドバイスしたのです。翌日、彼は姿を表しませんでした。いえ、翌日どころか、それ以降ずっと」
languages.original_text: "I haven't rebuked a single errand boy on this ship." {n}Cassia ponders this for a moment.{/n} "Ah, I think I remember! A kind young man with a shy smile and skilful fingers with too much rotten ochre on his shoulders. I grew tired of the disgusting colour and advised him to lighten his burden by casting the weight off his shoulders. He did not come the next day. Or ever again."

traits.locale_text: 「あたくしはこの船の使用人を一人も叱責したことはありません」{n}カシアはしばらく考え込む。{/n}「ええ、思い出しました！内気な笑みを浮かべ、指先の器用な優しい青年が、肩に腐った黄土を抱えすぎていたのです。あたくしはその嫌な色に嫌気がさして、肩の荷を下ろすようにアドバイスしたのです。翌日、彼は姿を表しませんでした。いえ、翌日どころか、それ以降ずっと」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Ich habe auf diesem Schiff keinen einzigen Botenjungen gerügt." {n}Cassia denkt kurz darüber nach.{/n} "Ah, ich glaube, ich erinnere mich! Ein freundlicher junger Mann mit einem schüchternen Lächeln, geschickten Fingern und zu viel verfaultem Ocker auf den Schultern. Ich wollte die abstoßende Farbe nicht mehr sehen und riet ihm, seine Bürde zu erleichtern, indem er die Last auf seinen Schultern abwirft. Am nächsten Tag kam er nicht wieder. Oder überhaupt jemals."
languages.original_text: "I haven't rebuked a single errand boy on this ship." {n}Cassia ponders this for a moment.{/n} "Ah, I think I remember! A kind young man with a shy smile and skilful fingers with too much rotten ochre on his shoulders. I grew tired of the disgusting colour and advised him to lighten his burden by casting the weight off his shoulders. He did not come the next day. Or ever again."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe auf diesem Schiff keinen einzigen Botenjungen gerügt." {n}Cassia denkt kurz darüber nach.{/n} "Ah, ich glaube, ich erinnere mich! Ein freundlicher junger Mann mit einem schüchternen Lächeln, geschickten Fingern und zu viel verfaultem Ocker auf den Schultern. Ich wollte die abstoßende Farbe nicht mehr sehen und riet ihm, seine Bürde zu erleichtern, indem er die Last auf seinen Schultern abwirft. Am nächsten Tag kam er nicht wieder. Oder überhaupt jemals."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Je n'ai jamais réprimandé qui que ce soit sur ce vaisseau. » {n}Cassia réfléchit un court instant.{/n} « Ah, je crois que cela me revient ! S'agissait-il d'un jeune homme au sourire timide et très habile de ses doigts ? Oui, il affectionnait l'ocre cramoisi, si vous saviez. Naturellement, la couleur est particulièrement affreuse, alors j'ai fini par lui conseiller de se libérer du fardeau qui pesait sur ses épaules. Il n'est pas revenu le jour suivant. Ni depuis. »
languages.original_text: "I haven't rebuked a single errand boy on this ship." {n}Cassia ponders this for a moment.{/n} "Ah, I think I remember! A kind young man with a shy smile and skilful fingers with too much rotten ochre on his shoulders. I grew tired of the disgusting colour and advised him to lighten his burden by casting the weight off his shoulders. He did not come the next day. Or ever again."

traits.locale_text: « Je n'ai jamais réprimandé qui que ce soit sur ce vaisseau. » {n}Cassia réfléchit un court instant.{/n} « Ah, je crois que cela me revient ! S'agissait-il d'un jeune homme au sourire timide et très habile de ses doigts ? Oui, il affectionnait l'ocre cramoisi, si vous saviez. Naturellement, la couleur est particulièrement affreuse, alors j'ai fini par lui conseiller de se libérer du fardeau qui pesait sur ses épaules. Il n'est pas revenu le jour suivant. Ni depuis. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Bu gemideki herhangi bir ayakçıyı azarlamışlığım yok." {n}Cassia biraz düşünüyor.{/n} "Ha, hatırladım! Utangaç bir gülümsemeye ve yetenekli parmaklara sahip iyi yürekli bir genç adam vardı. Omuzlarına çok fazla çürümüş toprak sarısı binmişti. O iğrenç renkten yorulduğum için ona omuzlarının üzerindeki yükü bir kenara atıp hafiflemesini tavsiye etmiştim. Ertesi gün gelmedi. Hatta hiç geri gelmedi."
languages.original_text: "I haven't rebuked a single errand boy on this ship." {n}Cassia ponders this for a moment.{/n} "Ah, I think I remember! A kind young man with a shy smile and skilful fingers with too much rotten ochre on his shoulders. I grew tired of the disgusting colour and advised him to lighten his burden by casting the weight off his shoulders. He did not come the next day. Or ever again."

traits.locale_text: "Bu gemideki herhangi bir ayakçıyı azarlamışlığım yok." {n}Cassia bunun üzerine biraz düşünüyor.{/n} "Ah, hatırladım sanırım! Utangaç bir gülümsemeye ve yetenekli parmaklara sahip iyi yürekli bir genç adamdı ama omuzlarının üzerinde çok fazla çürümüş toprak sarısı vardı. O iğrenç renkten yorulduğum için ona omuzlarının üzerindeki yükü bir kenara atıp hafiflemesini tavsiye etmiştim. Ertesi gün geri gelmedi. Hatta hiç geri gelmedi."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
